Detailed Description

BasketQueue default type traits.

Member Typedef Documentation

◆ memory_model

typedef opt::v::relaxed_ordering cds::container::basket_queue::traits::memory_model

C++ memory ordering model.

Can be opt::v::relaxed_ordering (relaxed memory model, the default) or opt::v::sequential_consistent (sequentially consisnent memory model).

◆ stat

typedef basket_queue::empty_stat cds::container::basket_queue::traits::stat

Internal statistics (by default, disabled)

Possible option value are: basket_queue::stat, basket_queue::empty_stat (the default), user-provided class that supports basket_queue::stat interface.
